Premium Christmas Trees Delivered Fresh

Nordmann Fir Christmas trees from our family farm in Glynn, Wexford. Soft needles, minimal shedding, and professional delivery service.

Why Choose Trees2You

Five years of experience serving Wexford families with premium trees, exceptional service, and the convenience modern families need.

Family Safe

Soft needles that won't hurt children or pets, making decorating safe and enjoyable for the whole family.

Minimal Shedding

Superior needle retention keeps your home clean throughout the holiday season with minimal maintenance.

Convenient Delivery

Professional delivery service within 15km of our farm. Perfect for busy families and those without transport.

Quality Guarantee

Every tree is hand-selected, fresh-cut, and guaranteed to maintain its beauty throughout the season.

Premium Nordmann Fir

We exclusively grow Nordmann Fir trees, recognized as the premium choice for Christmas trees.

Trusted Locally

Five years serving Wexford families with over 1,000 satisfied customers and growing.

Simple Process, Perfect Results

Three easy steps to your perfect Christmas tree

1

Choose Your Tree

Browse our selection of premium Nordmann Fir trees from 5ft to 9ft. Each size is perfect for different spaces and needs.

2

Visit or Deliver

Visit our farm in Glynn for the full experience, or choose our convenient delivery service within 15km of our location.

3

Enjoy Christmas

Set up your beautiful tree with minimal mess and enjoy weeks of Christmas magic with superior needle retention.

Ready for Your Perfect Tree?

Join hundreds of satisfied Wexford families who trust Trees2You for their Christmas tradition. Premium trees, professional service, lasting memories.
